verses.verse: <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> was twenty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%> And his mother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3388>Jerushah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok.<s%>

And he <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that his father <S%H1>Uzziah<s%> had <S%H5818>done;<s%> <S%H6213>however<s%> he did not <S%H7534>enter<s%> the <S%H935>temple<s%> of the <S%H1964>Lord.<s%> But the <S%H3068>people<s%> <S%H5971>continued<s%> <S%H5750>acting<s%> <S%H7843>corruptly.<s%>

He <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H5945>upper<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7230>extensively<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of <S%H6077>Ophel.<s%>

Moreover, he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1003>fortresses<s%> and <S%H4026>towers<s%> on the <S%H2793>wooded<s%> [hills.]

He <S%H3898>fought<s%> also with the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> and <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them so that the <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him during that <S%H8141>year<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3734>kors<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> of <S%H8184>barley.<s%> The <S%H1121>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5983><s%> also <S%H7725>paid<s%> him <S%H2088>this<s%> [amount] in the <S%H8145>second<s%> and in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4421>wars<s%> and his <S%H1870>acts,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

He was twenty-five <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers, and they <S%H1>buried<s%> him in the <S%H6912>city<s%> of <S%H5892>David;<s%> and <S%H1732>Ahaz<s%> his <S%H271>son<s%> <S%H1121>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
